SELECT ci.client_apply_code as clientApplyCode, cit.invoice_type as invoiceType, ci.amount as amount, ci.`status` as status, ci.create_time as createTime, ci.quantity as quantity, cop.client_order_code as clientOrderCode FROM client_invoice ci JOIN client_invoice_template cit ON cit.id = ci.invoice_template_id JOIN client_order_personal cop ON ci.client_order_id = cop.id JOIN client_user cu ON ci.client_user_id = cu.id
cu.client_user_code = #{clientUserCode} AND ci.`status` = #{status} AND (ci.client_apply_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') OR cop.client_order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param},'%'))
ORDER BY ci.create_time DESC

SELECT count(1) FROM client_invoice ci JOIN client_order_personal cop ON ci.client_order_id = cop.id WHERE cop.client_order_code = #{clientOrderCode} AND (ci.`status` = 0 OR ci.`status` = 1 OR ci.`status` = 2 OR ci.`status` = 4)

SELECT cop.client_order_code as orderCode, cop.order_status_id as statusId, cop.payment_method as paymentMethod, cop.grand_total as grandTotal, ci.amount as applyAmount, cosa.receiver_name as receiverName, cosa.receiver_phone_number as receiverPhoneNumber, cosa.address_alias as addressAlias, cosa.detail_address as detailAddress, ci.client_apply_code as clientApplyCode, cit.invoice_type as invoiceType, ci.create_time as createTime, cit.invoice_title as invoiceTitle, cit.tax_identification_number as taxIdentificationNumber, cit.company_name as companyName, cit.bank as bank, cit.bank_account as bankAccount, cit.reg_address as regAddress, cit.reg_telephone as regTelephone, cit.remark as remark FROM client_invoice ci LEFT JOIN client_invoice_template cit ON ci.invoice_template_id = cit.id LEFT JOIN client_order_personal cop ON ci.client_order_id = cop.id LEFT JOIN client_order_shipping_address cosa ON ci.shipping_address_id = cosa.id JOIN client_user cu ON ci.client_user_id = cu.id WHERE cop.client_order_code = #{clientOrderCode} and cu.client_user_code = #{clientUserCode}

SELECT mi.apply_amount as applyAmount, mi.merchant_apply_code as merchantApplyCode, mil.delivery_type as deliveryType, ec.company_name as companyName, mil.number as number, mil.delivery_person as deliveryPerson, mil.delivery_phone as deliveryPhone FROM merchant_invoice mi LEFT JOIN merchant_order mo ON mi.merchant_order_id = mo.id LEFT JOIN client_order_personal cop ON mo.client_order_id = cop.id LEFT JOIN merchant_invoice_logistics mil ON mil.merchant_invoice_id = mi.id LEFT JOIN express_company ec ON mil.express_company_id = ec.id WHERE cop.client_order_code = #{clientOrderCode}
